title: Marketplace Agentic Architecture Framework
description: Establish framework for understanding when to use agents vs other automation approaches in the Webflow Marketplace, with path from internal tooling to production systems
author: Micah Johnson

stories.title: Framework: Agents vs Alternatives Comparison Table
stories.description: Create a detailed comparison table expressing when to use agents vs scripts, APIs, webhooks, IaaS, automations, etc. Include dimensions like cost, risk, human-loop requirements, and latency.
acceptance: Table covers all identified automation approaches

stories.title: Use Case Evaluation: Catalog Existing Patterns
stories.description: Document all existing use cases that could benefit from agentic approaches. Include app security reviewer, design analysis, pre-validator app, and error record fixing patterns.
acceptance: Each use case has current state documented

stories.title: Path to Production: Internal to External
stories.description: Define the graduation path from internal tools to production systems. Document the stages: internal development, human-in-the-loop, iteration, and external deployment.

stories.title: Guardrails: Cost & Risk Management
stories.description: Establish guardrails for agentic systems including token budgets, circuit breakers, audit logging, and human review requirements.

stories.title: Experiment: Pre-Validator App Agent Migration
stories.description: Migrate the pre-validator app to use agentic approach. Start with human-in-the-loop and iterate based on feedback.

stories.title: Experiment: App Security Review Agent
stories.description: Build agent-assisted security review for marketplace apps. Focus on understanding how the agent thinks and making decisions transparent.

stories.title: Observability: Agent Decision Transparency
stories.description: Build observability tooling to understand how agents think. Enable debugging of agent decisions and learning from outcomes.

stories.title: Documentation: Deeper Methodology
stories.description: Document the deeper methodology and approaches for agentic engineering. Include learnings about algorithms, context engineering, and self-healing systems.
